channel.title: Planet of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the planet of the day.

item.title: Lists of small Solar System bodies
item.description:
This is a list of the lists of small Solar System bodies and dwarf planets.
Lists of comets List of minor planets List of named minor planets (alphabetical) List of named minor planets (numerical) List of exceptional asteroids List of trans-Neptunian objects List of fast rotators (minor planets) List of slow rotators (minor planets) List of tumblers (small Solar System bodies) List of unnumbered minor planets Meanings of minor-planet names
